item.description:
THINGS TO KEEP IN MIND:
1. Please be ON TIME...it is very difficult to add in a player who is late. The game starts at 2pm sharp. You may want to arrive a bit early if need be.

2. Bring your calculators

3. Bring your favorite pencils and erasers (if you have them). We do provide pencils and erasers, but some people are just picky!

There is plenty of metered parking on Huntington Ave, and it's free since it's Sunday.

As always, please keep up your RSVP count. It really does help make things easier.
item.how_to_find_us: Dodge Hall, in a classroom on the LEFT after entering
item.name: February 22 Cashflow Meetup
